gaia::text::ReplacementTransformationMethod Class Reference

This transformation method causes the characters in the getOriginal array to be replaced by the corresponding characters in the getReplacement array. More...

Detailed Description

This transformation method causes the characters in the getOriginal array to be replaced by the corresponding characters in the getReplacement array.

This transformation method causes the characters in the getOriginal array to be replaced by the corresponding characters in the array.
